|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 70:3A:D8 |oui = 70:3A:D8
|stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt-deriv;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, populated,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/20/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAE1U5YN0710 |asin = B019DZ1JGG |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603E; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RM75 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This is a rather 'premium' router released from this company / this brand. :That being said, the price is still rather high versus other similar offerings from more notable name brand companies. For someone looking for a recent-ish '''MTK''' platform device, it's probably decent.
[https://wigle.net WiGLE] indicates the OUI used by the device (or, more specifically, most common to these default SSIDs) is almost exclusively 70:3A:D8. It's assumed to be correct (and also assumed used by the Ethernet interfaces)..
==Links of Interest== * [https://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=301245 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] : Vendor noted specifications of MT7621+MT7612E+MT7603E * [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=71296 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] : Notes the router as using a custom build of OpenWrt * [http://www.mbreviews.com/afoundry-ew1200-router-review/ Reviewed at '''MBReviews'''] : Notes the default SSIDS as '''AFOUNDRY-2.4G''' and '''AFOUNDRY-5.8G-11AC'''. * [https://git.lede-project.org/?p=source.git;a=commit;h=9b35815f0f0e10125d144c82595bbccbc83d6812 Commit adding support to LEDE] : 16 MiB SPI Flash * [http://denobishackingetico.blogspot.com/2017/07/actualizando-lede-openwrt-based-el.html On a blog]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/afoundry/afoundry_ew1200 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/afoundry/ew1200 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = 2.4 GHz may be unstable |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
